item.remodifier.modifier_book.tooltip.0: §9Combine with an item in an anvil to set its modifier.
attribute.remodifier.crit_chance.desc: The probability that you deal higher damage, excess critical hit rate will be converted to critical hit damage.
attribute.remodifier.crit_damage.desc: The damage multiplier for critical hits
attribute.remodifier.no_consumption.desc: The probability that you don't consume ammo, trident is not considered a ranged weapon
attribute.remodifier.power_speed.desc: The charging speed when you use ranged weapons, trident is not considered a ranged weapon
attribute.remodifier.bullet_speed.desc: The speed of projectiles when you use ranged weapons, trident is not considered a ranged weapon
attribute.remodifier.bullet_damage.desc: The damage of projectiles when you use ranged weapons, trident is not considered a ranged weapon
attribute.remodifier.life_steal.desc: Your attacks will deal additional damage and this part of damage will be used to heal you
attribute.remodifier.vampire.desc: A part of damage dealt by your attacks will be used to heal you
attribute.remodifier.mining_speed.desc: Your mining speed will be multiplied by this coefficient
attribute.remodifier.healing_received.de: Your healing amount will be multiplied by this coefficient
